description: Karma serves dishes based on one's actions, not choices.
title: Karma Diner
n_1: John entered Karma, curious about its unique concept.
n_2: Puzzled, John sat down, watching others receive their dishes.
n_3: A plate arrived, John's face turned curious to concerned.
n_4: Realization dawned; John understood Karma’s true menu.
c1_4: I’ll be kinder for a better meal next time!
